name: HerdingSheep
description:
This is my first Unreal game I built out! Yay! I am still learning the ropes of Unreal so let me know what you think in comments.

Gamepad Controls:

Joysticks to Move

(A Button/Cross Button) to Jump

(Y Button/Triangle Button) to Throw

Keyboard Controls:

WASD or Arrows to Move

Space to Jump

Mouse Click to Throw
